body: Theoretically this could have been relaxed, but the function would have to be called `set_edge` and take a `grad_fn` and `output_nr` (and check that the new one is 0)
body_html: Theoretically this could have been relaxed, but the function would have to be called set_edge and take a grad_fn and output_nr (and check that the new one is 0)
